JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a responsible and flexible supervisor with a technical background to join our team. We are a unique Danish niche company that can offer an exciting and challenging daily life in an international environment.

Our professional qualifications are as diverse as our cultural backgrounds, but we have one thing in common - we are all proud to create a fantastic product that makes a difference in many sectors. Perlite is used for insulation, building material, and soil improvement, just to name a few examples. When we process perlite, we heat it to over 1000 degrees Celsius. This causes it to expand to 10-20 times its original size. Naturally, we produce a lot of heat. We reuse this heat in many local households to make your new workplace sustainable and energy-efficient.

You will be the person responsible for the production floor. You will delegate responsibilities to factory workers and ensure that the ovens are running smoothly. You will collaborate with your colleagues on optimizing production and ensuring that quality is top-notch.

Your responsibilities as a supervisor:

  • ·       Process controlling
  • ·        Quality assurance
  • ·        Assigning tasks to technicians in case of malfunctions
  • ·        Fixing oven problems of lesser technical difficulty
  • ·        Optimizing processes at a strategic level
  • ·        Responsible for keeping the production area clean and tidy

About you:

  • ·        You have a technical background
  • ·        You are flexible
  • ·        You are fluent in English
  • ·        You have an analytical approach to problems
  • ·        Ability to prioritize staffing as well as breaks without stopping the equipment
  • ·        Able to maintain an overview of the production in busy situations
  • ·        You should have at least EU residency. If you live in Denmark, it's an advantage
  • ·        Having management experience is a plus

What we can offer:

  • ·        A dynamic workplace with challenging and varied tasks
  • ·        A flat organizational structure with fast decision-making processes
  • ·        An international culture, colleagues from different countries
  • ·        Opportunities for personal and professional growth in a continuously developing company
  • ·        Focus on green initiatives and a sustainable workplace
  • ·        A company culture where employee well-being is a focus

If you want to become part of our team at Nordic Perlite and thrive in a high-energy environment with a focus on constant improvement, please send your application and CV to job@nordiskperlite.dk. We look forward to hearing from you!
